text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The day of the National Umamusume<n>Karuta Championship
arrives.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
I-it's finally here... Just thinking about<n>it is making me
nervous... Ooh, my<n>tummy...

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
I-it'll be fine! We prepped the best we<n>could, and even if we
don't do so hot,<n>I'm sure Shiraoki won't mind!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
By the way, do you know where the<n>others went off to?
It's almost time,<n>so we need to get changed soon...

text_block_list.name: Interviewer
text_block_list.text:
So you have your eyes on first place<n>and nothing less, is
that right?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Why of course! I am here today to<n>proclaim to the karuta
world that a<n>new overlord is crowned!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
I hereby declare, that the main<n>character at today's
tournament shall<n>be none other than me, T.M. Opera O!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
We practiced a bunch, so I hope we<n>can win a bunch too!
We'll give it our<n>all!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: H-hold up! I was not expecting tofind you doing THIS! Seriously, whatare you two even saying?!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
You can't just... Total beginners like<n>us belong in a corner
somewhere<n>sitting quietly by ourselves!

text_block_list.name: Female Spectator A
text_block_list.text:
Hey, those girls over there, you think<n>they're from Tracen?
They look pretty<n>competent.

text_block_list.name: Male Spectator A
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, but racing and karuta are<n>different. If the game were
that easy<n>to win, it wouldn't be a sport.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Eep... They're totally surrounded... I-I<n>don't think I can walk
up to them...

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Doto...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Wahh?! A-Ayabe! W-wait, are you<n>here to cheer us on?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Oh, u-umm, thanks for the karuta<n>books the other day!
Without your<n>help, I would've been so doomed...

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Don't say that... You're the one who<n>put in the hard work.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
I barely did anything, and if I did, it's<n>only because of your
help. And you<n>even took the time to be here for us...

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text:
Not really, I just happened to be<n>nearby. Anyway, think you
can do it?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, um... I mean, I'm not sure, but I<n>think we'll do fine!
And I'll try my<n>best not to drag the team down!

text_block_list.name: Karuta Commentator
text_block_list.text:
And with that, memorization time is<n>over, and we're ready
to begin the<n>Umamusume Karuta Championship,<n>round
one, match three.

text_block_list.name: Karuta Commentator
text_block_list.text:
We have newcomers to the<n>tournament, the Tracen team<n>
everyone's been talking about, Great<n>Fortune in the New
Year!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: It is time... New Overlord and Friends,<n>are we ready?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Our team name is actually Great<n>Fortune in the New Year,
but yes, Doto<n>and I are good to go!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: W-we c-c-can't do it! I meancan!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: I'm all ready to go too! Let's knock it<n>out of the park!

text_block_list.name: Karuta Commentator
text_block_list.text:
And now let's get into the match,<n>beginning with the starting
poem.

text_block_list.name: Reciter Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Naniwa Harbor: behold its<n>blossoming plum, once sealed in<n>
winter; springtime is now upon us,<n>the blossoming plum
declares.

text_block_list.name: Reciter Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Umamusume, mountainous...

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Urara, guard! Just like we practiced,<n>don't let anyone
through!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Remember all the hard work you put<n>in. With your guts, you
can stand up to<n>anyone!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Leave it to me, Fuku!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: O-O-Opera O, our side, right, three-two!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Mine!

text_block_list.name: Opponent Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Holy... That was fast!

text_block_list.name: Opponent Umamusume B
text_block_list.text: They just got lucky! This is literally<n>their first tourney!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Oh? It appears the room is haunted by<n>a sleep-inducing
trickster of the<n>woods.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
They dream that our skill is mere<n>luck... I suppose we shall
have to<n>wake them up!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Fuku! I did it!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
You did great, Urara! All of you did! I<n>have a good feeling
about this. We<n>just might pull it off!

text_block_list.name: Karuta Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Our newcomers show great<n>coordination to take the first
card.<n>Team Great Fortune in the New<n>Year—can they take
the second too?

text_block_list.name: Karuta Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Just as a reminder, the second half of<n>the poem we just
heard will now be<n>read before moving on to the next<n>
poem.

text_block_list.name: Reciter Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Unto the highest of heights, ride<n>swiftly, shadow of night...<n>
Umamusume, go forth unto—

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: O-o-oh, Opera O! Their field, left,<n>two-one!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Urara! Get over to their side! Keep<n>them occupied!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Got it!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: And mine again!

text_block_list.name: Male Spectator A
text_block_list.text: Whoa! T.M. Opera O is freakingfast!

text_block_list.name: Male Spectator B
text_block_list.text:
Let's not forget Haru Urara's<n>blocking! I think this team
could go<n>pretty far!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: You guys! Let's win this!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Yeah... Yeah, let's! Don't hold back.<n>We're in it to win it!
